survey_brief: This survey aims to understand user engagement and satisfaction with our mobile application to identify areas for improvement and enhance user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use our mobile app?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency. Ensure options cover all possible usage patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you use our mobile app?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to capture feature usage. Ensure options are clear and relevant.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use our mobile app?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Keep it concise.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use our mobile app?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of our mobile app?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure all options are balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of our mobile app?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in our mobile app?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selects 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q4.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather specific feedback for dissatisfied users.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in our mobile app?
script.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selects 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q4.
